short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow you to use shortcut for your favorite urls

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
sometimes people just too lazy to use bookmark for their favorite urls,
with this extension, you can easily go to your favorite pages by typing short cuts (so command-line style right?)

you can use following commands on the search bar to do:

1. add www.facebook.com to your favorite list using key->fb:
coo add fb  facebook.com  

2. go to www.facebook.com by typing its key:
coo fb

3. you can also add the current page to the list with a . (lazy style):
coo add fb . 

bang, so easy
